title: How to Prepare Stuffed Brinjal

steps.headline: Take 250gms of brinjal preferably round and of small variety.
Split into 4 keeping the stem intact.
steps.description:
Soak in salt water for ten minutes. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5d\/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/5\/5d\/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/aid474667-v4-728px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

steps.headline: Heat half spoon of oil and add 2 spoons split black gram .
1 spoon jeera, 4 or 5 red chillies ,little hing, half spoon bengal gram a little fenugreek seeds called methi,1 spoon dry coriander called dhania.
steps.description:
Fry them . {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/75\/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/7\/75\/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/aid474667-v4-728px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

steps.headline: And make it into a powder using a grinder.
Remove brinjals from water and stuff the powder in them.
Heat 4spoons of oil in the same thick fry pan again and put all the stuffed brinjals in them .
steps.description: Cover them with a saucer type plate and put little water on the plate.

steps.headline: Cook for 5, minutes turn brinjals delicately and continue the process till they are done.
Finally transfer to a bowl and serve with hot rice.

text:
Take 250gms of brinjal preferably round and of small variety. Split into 4 keeping the stem intact. Soak in salt water for ten minutes. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5d/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/5d/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/aid474667-v4-728px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Heat half spoon of oil and add 2 spoons split black gram . 1 spoon jeera, 4 or 5 red chillies ,little hing, half spoon bengal gram a little fenugreek seeds called methi,1 spoon dry coriander called dhania. Fry them . {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/75/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/7/75/Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/aid474667-v4-728px-Prepare-Stuffed-Brinjal-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} And make it into a powder using a grinder. Remove brinjals from water and stuff the powder in them. Heat 4spoons of oil in the same thick fry pan again and put all the stuffed brinjals in them . Cover them with a saucer type plate and put little water on the plate. Cook for 5, minutes turn brinjals delicately and continue the process till they are done. Finally transfer to a bowl and serve with hot rice.
